desc: Please provide a sample scene and a brief documentation of how adapt this to my own scene.Level should contain a simple maze and a character(unity animator)In the maze there are several targets.When one target is clicked by mouse, the character starts to move towards this target.When another target is selected, the character stops its current pathfindingand moves towards the current selected.Solution should be a single script for the character - to set up all needed other components- character has an unity animator component- walking should be triggered by setting a float variable "speed" to a "speed-value" parameter- character should rotate along its path.For convenience and demo purposes further scripts can be addedNot part of this project is- handling doors- handling ladders- handling elevators- avoiding dynamic obstaclesEstimated time of work 5 hoursDeliverables.unitypackge file containing sample scene and scriptsPDF Documentation on how to set upTotal $180
title: Unity 3D character path finding programmer
